caption: I have always loved their juices now I'm officially a fan of their food! Do yourself a favor and try the stuffed avocado, you won't regret it!

Most amazing place! Your “one stop shop” for all things holistic. Juices are fantastic! Definitely a go to place. We miss it so much because we moved but miss it daily it’s THAT good. Not to mention the amazing customer service!

Super friendly and helpful, the atmosphere was amazing!!! Definitely coming back. Adrian definitely helped me when I came to finding a beneficial shooter for what I was going for, and it was amazing. The overall experience was great. Highly recommend, 10/10!

Where do I begin???? I decided to give juicing a try and I looked for a local juicing business and found Prima Elements. I was clueless and had no idea where to begin. The guy explained the different juice cleanses they offered. I ordered …

I used to live in Fayetteville and would get juices, do juice cleanses, and get massages at Prima Elements. The owners, Audrey & Adrian, are so knowledgeable and kind. Their juices are THE BEST I’ve ever had. On a recent trip driving from …

Prima Elements is a wonderful place! The yoga classes are excellent and the environment is soothing and peaceful. I love the exercise equipment and always follow a great workout with a delicious smoothie or juice shot. You must try the ionic foot bath! You will be amazed at what toxins are lurking in your body!
My Reiki experiences have been truly amazing, I love everything about Prima from the service to the goodies at the bar.
We come here at least twice a week for their smoothies and juices!!! Everything is freshly made without all the added sugar! And the owners are soooo nice!! They also offer yoga and fitness classes!!
Great welcoming atmosphere and savory vegan mushroom soup. The salad is also very flavorful and filling.
So glad for Prima Elements being here in Fayetteville and for them offering a plethora of services and creating a space for wellness within our community. Plus the vegan food is amazing!

Did a 2 day juice cleanse, overall great experience. The staff I spoke to were very professional and polite, nice clean space, too. The owner personally greeted me at the door when I returned the glass jars. 👍🏻  It would be nice to have the nutritional info on the juices (cal), but not a deal breaker, will come back!

Prima is amazing! The atmosphere here relaxes you as soon as you walk through the door. Everyone here is very friendly, knowledgeable, and accommodating. The juice bar is awesome, and they have lots of services to offer. Extremely pleased with my membership!

Prima Elements is amazing!!!  I have benefited from many of their range of services, to include yoga, massage, water, RestStation, Qi Gong, meditation, as well as their delicious juices and food offerings.  Each and every staff member has …
LOVE IT!!!!  I've enjoyed their smoothies and their ionic foot detox, on several occasions.  The customer service is awesomeness!

The Absolute best mentally relaxing environment in Fayetteville. The staff are professional and personable. Services offered are taylored for individual needs. I will definitely go back and recommend this business to everyone I know.

I have had more than one service at Prima Elements Holitic Wellness and all five were great. My first was a massage with smootie afterwards.Next a meditation session. Followed by my two children attending yoga summer camp last summer. I …

Prima Elements fosters a superb community of people offering a wide range of holistic and healthy services, products and nutrition offerings in a welcoming, safe and fun environment. A very unique and value based wellness center for our city! My favorite small business in Fayetteville!

I discovered Prima Elements Holistic Wellness Center about a year ago and I have been there at least once a week since. I enjoy the atmosphere and the friendliness amongst the owners & I appreciate them working so hard. I enjoy the the soo …

My 2nd time getting the foot detox and its great and effective. The staff is kind and knowledgeable and customer service is amazing! Happy to have found this place. Cant wait to explore more of what they have to offer.

Prima is a wonderful place to have your WHOLE person experience healing and growth. The staff at Prima are knowledgeable and experts in their respected fields, they continue to delve deeper into the world of holistic medicine and lifestyle …

The first thing you'll notice upon walking in to Prima Elements is the calm relaxing atmosphere that instantly causes the stress of your day to leave!   Prima Elements is my "go to" place for so many things such as yoga, meditation, CBD, …

I love the peaceful vibe at Prima. It's always a breath of fresh air to walk in the doors and be greeted with a smile! They're my go to for fresh smoothies and juices and great conversations about health and life!

I tried the 3-day juice cleanse and I loved it! It was easy to follow and the juices were delicious! My sugar and carb cravings were minimal after the 3-days. I plan on ordering another cleanse when I return to Fayetteville. I also …

I have been a customer of Prima Elements for the last year and the service I have received has been nothing less than outstanding, rewarding, and health enhancing. The rest Station , Juices , Smoothies, massage therapy and other service and products are the best.Highly recommended!
Prima is a great center to get your mind and body aligned with yoga, meditation, rest station and fresh fruit shakes. Adrianna and Adrian are always helpful and welcoming.

Very knowledgeable, trustworthy, and passionate. CBD, essential oils, juice cleanses, massage, yoga, and more- there’s so much on offer. You can feel at ease knowing that you’re being supplied with great quality because if they don’t …
Their smoothies are Thee best!! The relaxation room is awesome always put me to sleep.
I absolutely love this place. They are always so nice, call me by name when I come in, really just make you feel welcome and cared for.

Prima Elements is awesome! I've participated in the juice cleanse and foot detox and can't say enough good things about the experience or the people. The owners are AWESOME -- so knowledgeable, welcoming and generous and always offering me ways and suggestions to help improve my health and wellness! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

I went here yesterday (03.02.2020) cause a co-worker recommended it. The reception was great. We literally sat there and spoke about health and wellness for about an hour. Just educating each other, and joking around like we were old friends, and that to me made for an amazing experience. I'm definitely going back 100%.
Amazing visit every time. I always receive the warmest welcomes and at times a sample of outstanding vegan drinks. I also come frequently for my Alkaline Water subscription.

I got the foot detox treatment today and while not pleasant to watch, it really makes you think about what you're putting into your body. I don't eat processed foods and drink water and coffee and still the color of the water changed to …

Rebecca was incredible. This was my first time getting cupping done, and it was a wonderful experience. Rebecca combined the deep tissue massage with the cupping, and explained in detail every step for me as I was very curious. Completely satisfied with the experience and will for sure be coming back!

Rebecca did a fabulous massage and I felt so much better afterwards. Had pain in my neck and shoulders after sleeping on a bad pillow. I rescheduled another service for myself and one for my daughter in law just to pamper ourselves!

The best place in town for a Massage, Rest Station, Natural Juice for a cleanse. If you a veteran I encourage you to try the Rest Station for your anxiety or PTSD  or even if you not a veteran I encouraged it as well.
My massage from Amanda was phenomenal! Will definitely be back.

Rebecca gave me the best massage of my entire life. I love the atmosphere. I’ve taken a guided meditation class there, which was awesome. I also will go in for a delicious smoothie when I am wanting something light for lunch. Love this …
Great down to earth people! Their smoothies and juices are all organic! I recommend stopping there 😉
Love this place!  I found it while jogging downtown.  A hidden gem!  Great smoothies and a friendly and knowledgeable staff!  Highly recommended!

Very pleasant place to visit...was very impressed with the customer service...made you feel very comfortable and was very knowledgeable as well! Top notch place to go for CBD oil and holistic to smoothies and massage...this place should be for everyone in Fayetteville to go and unwind to find there inner peace! 50 Stars for me !!!!

An absolutely phenomenal experience. The way I was treated from the moment I walked through the door, it felt so inclusive. There is a sense of positivity that exudes from every staff member.  My massage was the best I have ever had. Wes …

I passed by this place for months before finally looking it up.  They have so much to offer to the community.  Very informed on CBD, essential oils and more.  My first visit here, I had a reflexology massage and was thrilled at the results. …

I loved the Prima Elements 5-day juice cleanse!  I was worried that I’d be tempted to misbehave too much with all of the delicious foods during the holidays with family, so I decided to do a juice 5-day juice cleanse between Christmas and …

I love Prima!!!  I visit everyday to start my day right.  The smoothies are the best the juices will drop kick your lazy day into a driven day.  Come in and share your experiences with the owners they are always willing to sit down and have a conversation or offer words of encouragement.  Also that CBD oil tho...
Love this place. It's so inviting and welcoming. I enjoy coming here just to hangout. The juices are always fresh and the home brewed kombucha is better then any store bought ones hands down.
Thank you Adrian for the wonderful (GAL) Ginger Apple Lemonade made with LOVE!! I will be back for sure!!!
Finally stepped into this amazing placewas able to do a 10 min rest station and it was very rejuvenating. I was ready to start my day all over and being 8 months pregnant that means a lot.
Had a deep tissue massage with Rebecca who is a very talented therapist. The chronic pain lessened, I felt understood when I told her my issues, and she was all around pleasant. I highly recommend!

Wow!  Went to Prima Elements to try out the RestStation and walked in to have everyone great me and feel at ease right away.  Adrian was so welcoming.  Had no idea what to expect from the RestStation but I do know that after I felt so …

Tonight I tried the RESTSTATION Lounge. I just knew there was music and I meditate on a regular basis... but this was one of those experiences that it’s hard to put in words. Sort of like an outer body experience, my body felt very relaxed. …

What a warm and inviting space to be in!  You can't help but feel good the moment you walk through the door.  Thank you so much for the complimentary RestStation session.  I left there feeling relaxed and peaceful yet energized after a 30 minute session.  Prima Elements Holistic Wellness Center is a wonderful place!
This place is awesome, great customer service, great  overall experience. I go there at least 2x a week

Beautiful place to come and relax your mind, get a quality massage after a great workout and finish up with delicious fresh fruit smoothie!! Not to mention all in the same place! I highly recommend everyone who is in the area to stop by to see for themselves!!
Excellent massage from Tierra! Even better than top competitor and I caught an awesome promotion! I will return!

Walking into prima you immediately feel relaxed and at peace. It's a great place to just go and chill and have a smoothie, which are amazing by the way  The fresh press juices really hit the spot. I just love all the workshops that they …

I literally just walked out of 120min hote stone massage and I could not be more pleased. I have been to other local massage facilities, to include the well known Renaissance, but the service (massage) I received was beyond my expectations. …

Have attended many mommy and me yoga sessions and will attend many more. They have tons of classes offered and the juice bar is awesome!  The staff is friendly, facility is clean. Would recommend to everyone!

From the first time I stepped foot into Prima, I knew this was a place where I wanted to become apart of and grow with. Thanks to Ms. Hilda, Adrian, & Audri I am embarking on a new journey of not only self healing but also helping others …

Outstanding smoothies and juices! It's remarkable what FRESH presses juices can do to your digestive system. I recently took on a new journey of life to become healthier in a mind, body, and spiritual way. Found this gem located in downtown …

My mother recommend their smoothie and juice bar. Stopped by this afternoon on my lunch break to grab a "Southern Bell" smoothie. Their smoothie are full of fruit with no added ingredients. Completely raw and all natural, packed with vitamins, nutrients and minerals.  Best smoothies in Fayetteville!

Welcoming staff acquaint you with a number of therapeutic and enjoyable amenities from massages, yoga, exercise, and workshops to smoothies, wellness blends, and essential oils.  An inspiring multifaceted environment crafted to optimize well being and feng shui.
Attended a zumba class with André this past week. Best $5 i have ever spent. Prima Elements is affordable and i will be back.
Stopped by for a meditation class and ended up booming a massage and purchasing a three day juice detox cleanse.  Atmosphere is peaceful and relaxing. Glad to know a place line tbis exists.

Received a complementary massage from my work yo obtain at Prima Elements. My massage was relaxing and I look forward to visiting the establishment again.  The staff and therapists made my visit pleasent!

Had a couples massage and it was great! The prices are very reasonable and they gave us complimentary mimosas. This location has a juice, smoothie & Kombucha bar, too. A lovely spot in downtown Fayetteville!
This place was great. All I got was a smoothie, which was superb, and the service was even better. I will go back for another one.

I am trying to make my own Kombucha. I went to Prima Elements to get a SCOBY! They had what I needed. The Manager Audri helped me with the preparation details and was so sweet. I highly recommend this friendly business!
Satisfactory service and excellent clean and calming atmosphere
